name: 施欣文
schedule: Students meet with me during the semester three times as a group, and we do three group peer reviews. Students also meet with me individually as needed.
scorePolicy: Students' grades are determined partially by whether they meet the deadlines with the required number of pages, partially on whether they are making progress from draft to draft, partially on their participation in the group peer reviews and meetings and partially on the quality of their final project.
materials: Students select their own primary and secondary texts. I may recommend certain secondary sources to them.
consultation: Please make appointments for office hours as necessary.
remarks: Per requirement of the school, office hours may be conducted through Google Meet or other online meeting service.
